```{python}
#| label: fig-dco-switched-varactor
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "A switched differential varactor used for fine frequency control in a DCO."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.logic as lgc

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    M1 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False, arrow=False).theta(180)
    elm.Line().at(M1.gate).left(d.unit/4).dot(open=True)
    elm.Line().at(M1.drain).right(d.unit/2).dot()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    M2 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False, arrow=False).anchor('drain').reverse().theta(180)
    elm.Line().at(M2.gate).right(d.unit/4).dot(open=True)
    elm.Line().at(M1.source).right(d.unit/2).dot()
    pos = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)

    elm.Line().at(pos).down(d.unit)

    lgc.Not().down().reverse()
    elm.Dot(open=True).label('$S$', loc='bottom')
```
